text: @NYGovCuomo You mean the same nursing homes that you nuked with COVID-19 patients and your simultaneous refusal to provide them PPE??? Those nursing homes? You're not just an awful politician, you're a truly reprehensible person. #CuomoKills #CuomoLiedGrandmaDied
